name: Alpheida
description:
Play as an Alpheida, the last one of your kind and avenge your brothers by destroying all the pollution of the planet!

This game was made in less than a month for the Seajam gamejam using C++ and SDL2 (and since I'm bad at memory management please don't play for too long or your PC will just throw a blue screen at you).

This is actually my first real """finished""" game so don't expect too much of it :)

Let me now if anything is wrong with the game, I will try to fix it!
